Source.Name: foomatic-db-nonfree
Source.Summary: Foomatic database extension consisting of manufacturer-supplied PPD files released under non-free licenses which restricts them in how they can get redistributed.
Source.Description: Manfafacturer-supplied PPD files under non-free licenses
